OptionChoice.name: rlcrQuarryStoneDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Quarry Stone is generated

Choice.description: Quarry Stone is not generated in the world.

Substitute.name: rlcrOverworldOreSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Substitute.name: rlcrOverworldOreSubstitute1
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Veins.name: rlcrQuarryStone0Veins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

Cloud.name: rlcrQuarryStone0Cloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi-permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore.

Veins.name: rlcrQuarryStone0HintVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

Veins.name: rlcrSulfur1Veins

Veins.name: rlcrDarkDiamondGeodes0Shell
Veins.Description: The geode's outer shell, composed of the Pipe material.

Veins.name: rlcrDarkDiamondGeodes0Crystal
Veins.Description: The geode's inner material, usually some form of crystal.

Veins.name: rlcrDarkDiamondGeodes0AirBubble
Veins.Description: The air pocket within the center of a geode.
